name: Index
overview: Index is a bouldering paradise located in Washington, renowned for its solid granite and diverse boulder problems. It's popular during the spring and summer thanks to its pleasant weather. The area is known for its stunning views and challenging problems.

Index es un paraíso de la escalada en boulder situado en Washington, conocido por su granito sólido y sus problemas variados. Es popular durante la primavera y el verano debido a su clima agradable. La zona es reconocida por sus hermosas vistas y problemas desafiantes.
